description: How an ingestion agent expands this table into 168 explicit rules.
steps: Let FAMILIES \= {δ, Φ, Π, μ, λ, ψ, Σ, Θ, χ, Ω, ρ, Ξ}.
Let XI\_VARIANTS \= {Ξ, ΞG, ΞL, Ξ⊗, Ξ⊕, Ξ-\>NF, Ξ\*}.
Create rule: XiVar ∘ Family with result XiVar(Family), role=Xi\_lift.
Create rule: Family ∘ XiVar with result Family⟨XiVar⟩, role=Xi\_pushforward.
Additionally, P3 (Xi-normal-form) applies to arbitrary composed expressions Expr.
